channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How to Reach FIRE Based on Your Income ($45K – $100K/Year)
item.description: What does it mean to “win” financially in your income bracket? To us, the end goal is always FIRE (Financial Independence, Retire Early), and if you’re chasing financial freedom, this […]

item.title: Sequoia backs Pydantic to expand beyond its open source data-validation framework
item.description: Sequoia is investing $12.5M in UK startup Pydantic to help it expand beyond its open source data-validation framework. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: ‘A Life Sentence.’ How Mississippi’s Forever Voting Ban Keeps Thousands From the Polls.
item.description: The state’s disenfranchisement law punishes people with nonviolent offenses, as reform fails in the Legislature and courts.

item.title: WebMD Health Heroes 2024: Changing Medicine With AI
item.description: This year, we honor our Health Heroes who, despite their medical diagnoses, have been motivated to use artificial intelligence (AI) to discover cures, prevent fatal illnesses, and detect cancers early.

item.title: Star Sightings: Margot Robbie Shows Off Her Baby Bump at a Screening, Train and REO Speedwagon Perform in L.A.
item.description: The stars are out and about!

item.title: Warning Labels to Appear Whenever You Use Social Media Under New Bill
item.description: The newly introduced Stop the Scroll Act, if passed, will require social media platforms to include pop-up alerts with a mental health warning.

item.title: Is Investing in Hotels a Better Move Than Scaling Short-Term Rentals?
item.description: In the face of short-term rental regulations, among other struggles, are hotels a better option?

item.title: Invesco raises its valuation of Swiggy to $13.3B
item.description: Invesco has raised the value of its stake in Swiggy, ascribing an implied valuation of about $13.3 billion to the Indian food delivery and quick-commerce startup. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Unhoused People Have Property Rights Too
item.description: A recent Supreme Court decision spurred a crackdown on people experiencing homelessness. Here’s how some are still fighting back.

item.title: Ways Coffee Impacts Depression Symptoms
Floral Designer and Unwilted Founder Liz Carter Shares Tips for Creating the Perfect Bouquets for Gatherings
item.description: Floral designer and Unwilted founder Liz Carter shares her top hosting tips with ET.

item.title: Suspected Houthi Attack: Drone Boat Strikes Ship in Red Sea
item.description: Tuesday's attacks appear to be the Houthis' first actions against commercial shipping in recent weeks.

item.title: Property Insurance Is Changing—Here’s What to Expect Next Year
item.description: Depending on the area of the country you’re investing in, property insurance costs can add many thousands to your annual costs—and in some areas of the country, these are rising rapidly.

item.title: The WordPress vs. WP Engine drama, explained
item.description: The world of WordPress, one of the most popular technologies for creating and hosting websites, is going through a very heated controversy. The core issue is the fight between WordPress founder and Automattic CEO Matt Mullenweg and WP Engine, which hosts websites built on WordPress. WordPress technology is open source and free, and it powers […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Judge Celebrezze Faces Misconduct Claims Over Appointing Lucrative Divorce Cases to Friend
item.description: Ohio Disciplinary Counsel alleges Cuyahoga County judge made false statement, had ties to court-appointed receiver paid over $500,000 in fees.

item.title: How Yoga Can Improve Mental Health
Hoka X Reformation Dropped a Sneaker Collab That's Stylish and Sporty
item.description: Reformation teamed up with prancercise icon Joanna Rohrback to debut the fun, sporty launch.

item.title: NATO Nation Says Sending Troops to Ukraine 'Serious Option'
item.description: The French minister for European affairs told a German newspaper that Paris was not ruling out deployment of forces to Ukraine.

item.title: 13 Real Estate Hot Spots You Won’t Want to Miss Next Year
item.description: Some cities across the United States are emerging as economic powerhouses, creating ideal conditions for real estate investors. Here's where to look.

item.title: Anduril speeds up launch of defense payloads by buying Apex satellite buses off the shelf
item.description: Anduril is expanding even further into the “ultimate high ground.” The company, which is best known for AI-powered defense products that span air, land and sea, is partnering with satellite bus manufacturing startup Apex Space to rapidly deploy payloads on orbit for the U.S. Department of Defense. It is a rare instance of the growing […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The Cleveland Judge Guide wins the Online News Association’s Gather Award
item.description: The Marshall Project, Signal Cleveland and Cleveland Documenters are honored for their community-centered coverage of local elections and judicial candidates.

item.title: New Music Friday September 27: Lady Gaga, Ciara, Christina Aguilera, Michael Buble, Luke Bryan and More
item.description: Check out some of ET's favorite new music of the week!

item.title: Bernese Mountain Dog Jumps on Beanbag—No One Prepared for What Happens Next
item.description: What makes the video even more hilarious is the reaction of the other pooch in the video who wanted no part of the chaos.

item.title: Tier becomes Dott following the merger of the two micromobility companies
item.description: With this merger, Dott and Tier didn’t want to build a conglomerate of micromobility services; the operation was all about scale. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The Marshall Project Wins Two Awards From The Institute for Nonprofit News Awards
item.description: Stories on fetal personhood and abusive prison guards won in the Explanatory Reporting and Investigative categories.

item.title: Charlotte Tilbury’s Holiday Collection Just Dropped and Darling, It’s Gorgeous (And Super Giftable)
item.description: The holiday season is time for effortlessly romantic makeup, hydrating skincare, and fantastic deals.

item.title: Kamala Harris Loses Advantage in Critical Battleground State
item.description: Kamala Harris has fallen behind Donald Trump in the swing state of Pennsylvania, according to a recent polling average.
